title: remake that shouldnt have been a remake?
body: i dced in loading screen and it gave me a little window saying i disconnected i have to reconnect, so i reconnect and got in the game, bought items and as i was leaving base a surrender vote came up and my entire team hit yes and it ended up being remade and i lost 20lp although I was there. this doesnt sound right how did this happen someone explain how thats fair. I was there but my team voted to remake anyway

replies.body: It sounds like you were gone for long enough for the match to meet the requirements of[ /remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ).  While we can't adjust game stats, I'm happy to help out with whatever is causing you to have issues.  Let me know in details, and I'd be happy to look into this with you!

Even though you reconnected, you were disconnected/AFK for at least 90 seconds, which is what is required for a remake vote to occur. It sucks that this happened, but the requirements for the remake vote were fulfilled, and unfortunately your team voted for it.
If you are not present for some percentage of the first 3 minutes, it's possible for a team to remake.
